Create a new campaign

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"description":"Bearer token","schema":{"type":"string","example":"Bearer <api-key>"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"domain_id":{"type":"integer","description":"Domain ID."},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the campaign.","example":"Example"},"domain":{"type":"string","description":"Domain associated with the campaign.","example":"example.com"},"branding_name":{"type":"string","description":"Branding name."},"branding_url":{"type":"string","description":"Branding URL."},"email_reports":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Notification handler IDs."},"is_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the campaign is enabled."}},"required":["name","domain"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Campaign created successfully","content":{"application/json":{"example":{"data":{"id":1}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
